title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: Download it from https://bitcoincore.org/en/download/An inaccurate information after clicking on Help > About Bitcoin Core. Developers should correct the Copyright to 2009-2023.Â  Code:Bitcoin Core version v24.0.1Copyright (C) 2009-2022 The Bitcoin Core developers

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Bitcoin Core 24.0.1 were released in 2022[1]. And any further update from the 25.x version will use the correct year.[2][1] https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-24.0.1/[2] https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/25.x/configure.ac#L7
